title: US Supreme Court hears landmark abortion case
content: The court's eventual ruling may cut off abortion access for tens of millions of American women.

title: US Supreme Court hears landmark abortion case
content: The court's eventual ruling may cut off abortion access for tens of millions of American women.

title: Time to consider mandatory jabs, says EU chief
content: EU countries should discuss forced vaccinations to combat the Omicron variant, says Ursula von der Leyen.

title: Fourth death confirmed in Michigan school shooting
content: Police allege the suspect, a 15-year-old student, used a gun his father had bought days earlier.

title: EU launches €300bn global bid to challenge China
content: The Global Gateway infrastructure plan is described as a true alternative to Chinese influence.

title: Ethiopia retakes world heritage site - government
content: Tigray rebels took control of Lalibela, famous for its 13th Century rock-hewn churches, in August.

title: The struggle to recover from NYC's flash flood
content: Victims of a historic flood in New York City reflect on the wreckage wrought by Hurricane Ida.

title: Doctor fined for amputating wrong leg of patient
content: The patient's right leg was removed instead of his left, with the mistake discovered two days later.
